values.value: his exception is used with both Visualforce pages and Salesforce Functions. Visualforce The exception is thrown when an invalid parameter is supplied for a method, or any problem is encountered with a URL used with Visualforce pages. For more information on Visualforce, see the Visualforce Developer's Guide.
